edus.text: pick green -4 1 5, pick green -5 1 4, pick green -5 1 5, pick green -5 2 5
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: place green -5 1 -5, place green -5 2 -5, place green -4 1 -5, place green -5 1 -4
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: now where you had the green blocks before
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: build the same thing but with yellow blocks
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: place yellow -5 1 5, place yellow -5 1 4, place yellow -5 2 5, place yellow -4 1 5
edus.speaker: Builder

edus.text: and finally the opposite side with purple
edus.speaker: Architect

edus.text: place purple 5 1 -5, place purple 5 1 -4, place purple 5 2 -5, place purple 4 1 -5
edus.speaker: Builder
